title: Add contrib/fast-vector-highlighter to Maven central repo
description:
I'm not at all familiar with the Lucene build/deployment process, but it would be very nice if releases of the fast vector highlighter were pushed to the maven central repository, as is done with other contrib modules.

(Issue filed at the request of Grant Ingersoll.)

comments.content: This patch adds  a pom template to fast-vector-highlighter.
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content: We should also think about pushing the artifact for 3.0 and 2.9. Has anyone done this before? Grant?
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content: I will commit this soon if nobody objects?!
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content:
commited in revision 887339.
I will leave this issue open as we need to port this to 3.0 / 2.9. I can not commit to branches, can anyone else do that please.
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content: I will merge the 2 branches. We should now discuss, if I should add the pom.xml to the 3.0 release checkout and rebuild this one artifact for evtually put it into the repo.
comments.author: Uwe Schindler

comments.content: We have a vote open for this topic - once the vote is over I publish the result here and close the issue.
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content: The vote passed - the artifacts have been pushed to the repo. and should be available soon.
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content:
The missing maven artifacts for the fast-vector-highlighter contrib of
Lucene Java in version 2.9.1 and 3.0.0 are now available at:

http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/lucene/
